cause.description:
all the lakes especially lake ontario are poluted and need our help saving it we need it so that we can swim in it withou getting sick or harmed. please join this cause to convince our government and members of the communitys to help this and support this casue we need our lakes clean!
1. Our lakes need to be clean to stop sicknesses from lake polution
2. we want our enviroment to stay cleanand harm fee for no only us but animals
3. we drink lake water make it better!
cause.mission: make the lakes cleaner and able to swim in
cause.name: save the lakes
